### ĐỀ BÀI
 ````
 from Crypto.Util.number import getPrime
from secret import flag

if __name__ == "__main__":
    p = getPrime(2020)
    q = getPrime(2020)
    n = p * q
    m = int.from_bytes(flag, "big")
    print("m_nbits =", m.bit_length())
    print("n =", n)
    print("c =", pow(m, 2020, n))
    print("a =", pow(2020, p + q, n))
    print("b =", pow(2020 + p, q, n))

# Output:
# m_nbits = 319
# 
n = 
c = 
a = 
b = 
 ````

### POC
````
from Crypto.Util.number import inverse, long_to_bytes, GCD

n = 
c = 
a = 
b = 

def sqrt(n):
    x = n
    y = (x + 1) // 2
    while y < x:
        x = y
        y = (x + n // x) // 2
    return x

p = GCD(b * 2020 - a, n)
q = n // p
phi = (p - 1) * (q - 1)
long_to_bytes(sqrt(sqrt(pow(c, inverse(2020, phi), n))))
````

> b'ASCIS{pl4y1ng_w1th_p_4nd_q_1s_d4ng3r0us}'
